knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
lotr  <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jennybc/lotr-tidy/master/data/lotr_tidy.csv") |> 
  rename(Species = Race)
```



```{r}
lotr
```

```{r}
lotr_wide <- lotr |>
  pivot_wider(id_cols = c(Film, Gender),
              names_from = Species,
              values_from = Words)
lotr_wide
```

```{r}
lotr_wide |>
  pivot_longer(cols = Elf:Man,
               names_to = "Species",
               values_to = "Words"
               )
```
